name: The Labour of Heracles
description:
Game Summary

The game follows the courageous Labors of Heracles. You, the player, take on an adventure of deadly trials, meant to test your perception, agility, strength, and intellect. As a demi-god you have powers to defeat mythical Greek creatures, which will let you take your place in the Pantheon, and to live among all the other Gods.

[PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN]

Goal - Kill the enemys and pass the parkour

After playing the DEMO please fill in this survey <3 :
